Description: Fragment of oval handle to sharp turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine red-pink. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, probably. Name Archembrotos. From a die close to Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0094.20.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (44)
